Name: Landlord of the Woods
About the game: A short game about feeling as if you are behind all your peers. Travel through the forest to collect rent from 5 quirky woodland residents Explore a detailed, hand-drawn lil world by pointing, clicking & pulling Solve simple logic & physics-based puzzles as you experience a delicate story that takes about an hour to complete hi, my name is Madison Karrh & i made this game. i appreciate that you would spend a piece of your limited time on this planet playing something that a stranger made. if you would like to play but can't prioritize buying it right now, I completely understand. message me on twitter: @handfulofbugs or email me at madisonkarrh[at]gmail[dot]com and I will send you a steam key.
